resources.string: Before you start using the app, we would like you to review the Privacy Policy and make informed choices about the personal data.
See the Privacy Policy here. You can also revisit it later via the Menu/Info Page. You can also revisit it later via the Menu / Info Page. You can always contact us with your privacy concerns at
We use Advertising Identifier to attribute previously served advertising to an app installation and for user analytics.
To manage the permissions regarding the Advertising ID, please go to Settings->Privacy->Advertising. Your current setting is:

Client UUID is a randomly generated ID that is saved with every measurement. Persistent Client UUID means that the ID is the same for your every measurement. It is needed to enable measurement history and synchronisation of the results between devices.
Please make your choice here. You can change it later in the Settings.

Analytics Information is used to understand how our users use the mobile apps and to continuously optimize the service. We also collect crash traces data that help us to statistically evaluate, analyse and resolve crashes and bugs.
Thank you for reviewing your privacy settings. You can always contact us with your privacy concerns at dpo@nettest.org.
There is one last choice to make - what king of user interface would you prefer to start with? You can, of course, change it later in the Settings.
